website_summaries.verdict: This front seat organizer goes the extra mile to keep opportunistic eyes off your goods with an anti-theft security flap. Ample compartments allow for a range of uses.
pros: A padded laptop compartment, file pocket, and pen holders keep office supplies organized
Mesh side pockets are ideal for bottles or small loose items
Security flap keeps contents out of sight
cons: There's no way to fasten the security flap

customer_reviews.title: Better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for law enforcement and security type people, or anyone who uses their car as an office. Made with a heavier duty material than i was expecting. Almost feels alot like some of my duty gear. Holds my giant clipboard and other notebooks and things i need everyday. Its also easy to take of or to just swing around to the back. For when you have a passenger. Its well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport from car to house, etc.!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Durable. Great storage w/ lots of pockets for organization! Flap helps items inside stay secure when transferring the bag from one location to the other. Simple to install/remove on car seat. Stays in place once fastened to the head rest. Makes it super easy to find items while driving, w/o diverting my attention from the road. Perfect for travel and/or daily use. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kathryn Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has so many pockets and spaces to put stuff. I love that it has a flap to cover your stuff when you get in and out of the vehicle. It also helps for additional security if you leave the bag inside the car. The strap fits around the headrest easily to snap into place with the bag resting in the seat which I also like so you're not putting tension on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: YC from Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely an organizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. As a home health PTA I am able to work from the front seat of my vehicle and remain organized. I am able to carry it with me with my tablet, clipboard, schedule book, and other necessary items. It is very sturdy too. I am able to position it to the front of my passenger seat when I need to use it and then to the back of the seat when I want it out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: necole

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well and item was exactly as decribed.
customer_reviews.text: Product was made well. Perfect for storing my ipad and office supplies. I added a piece to the bottom to make it more sturdy and flat for my liking. Packaging was very nice. Thx.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Passenger Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this car organizer. The quality is outstanding. Ordered it for my significant other who drives for a living and does alot of paperwork in his car and it works perfect for an organizer to hang on his passenger seat. Lots of different pockets and very spacious. Can easily fit binders, folders, clipboard, and even a labtop if needed. Easy to clean and also very sturdy. I love that if he needs to finish paper work inside he can easily carry it inside with the strap you can put over your shoulder. Would recommend to anyone who does alot of work in their car and needs and organizer for the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: With so many organizers out there it’s hard to choose. But this is the one you need. I am a Realtor and not only work out of my car, but often have clients in it as well so I needed a solution that would keep all items handy but out of sight for a nice clean look. The fold over messenger style flap on this organizer is genius. Not only does it hide my items out of plain sight, but if I choose to take it out of the car with me it can pass as a messenger bag. It’s a smaller size than others I’ve seen but still holds everything I need it to. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne H.

customer_reviews.title: Makes organizing easier.
customer_reviews.text: This seat-mounted vehicle organizer is very easy to use and install. The compartments are larger than I expected and I have had no issues with storing all of my various notepads, binders, pens, et al... The only thing I wish was included was a locking mechanism to keep the strap from slipping through the clasp to hold the organizer to the headrest. A simple knot fixed the problem, but a sliding lock or strap securing device would also be a handy fix. Regardless of the one trivial issue, I would highly recommend this organizer to anyone who has to have binders, notebooks, notepads, even laptops in their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hold music books because the pocket on the back of my vehicle’s front seats weren’t quite big enough so as not to tear the plastic bindings. This works perfectly. I hung it over the front of the back seat. Maybe later on I will find other things to put in it, but for now it works great for my purpose. I like that you can easily remove it from the seat and use it as a shoulder carry bag. Very versatile at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product - beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This front seat organizer is the perfect size for anyone who is in sales and needs to organizer their "car office". The quality of all of the Lusso products is outstanding with attention to detail in the stitching, pockets and structure of the item. Customer Service with Lusso is also top notch. Amazon sent me the wrong Lusso item and Lusso responded so quickly and resent out the correct order the very same day! I am extremely pleased with the Lusso brand and recommend all of their items for anyone wanting to organize their car in a stylish yet functional manner!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Shore

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome!!! Well put together and plenty of pockets and ample amount of space for all my trucker gadgets, electronics and needs! At the end of the week I throw the shoulder strap on my shoulder and my valuables go home with me safe and sound till my next trip! I'm absolutely impressed! Seeing it first hand, this is way under priced! Grab it before the price goes up! You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell See

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: As a Law Enforcement Officer, I find this to be super handy- I put everything from my disposable gloves to various forms and a clipboard in here. It keeps you from having to root around in your back seat or trunk- or worse yet- to have to chase down and track down items that roll off the seat during aggressive cornering or braking. Well worth the (relatively little) money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Junk holds nothing can't use the three pouches behind it horrible don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to his big as it looks. Will not hold anything shot can't fit a laptop in it matter of fact you really can't put anything in it what about using a bookbag don't even waste your money or your time it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan De Ciuceis

customer_reviews.title: A well-made Car Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work truck (F-350) and placed it behind the driver's seat since I work mainly from the back seat. Attaching it to the headrest itself - half way down - it hangs nicely there ... even through I believe it's supposed to be used on the front of the seat. Anyway, it's well-made of heavy weight material, and appears very durable. If I needed another, I wouldn't hesitate to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny the K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this and use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find... Very well made and tons of room inside... I use 3 organizers in my car and they are all awesome, I'd highly recommend this one for your front seat... I also love that I can just swing it around to the back or side if I have a passenger. If you work on the road, consider this part of a necessary traveling office! It can neatly hold everything you need... I also love the flap that covers all your contents. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped me stay organized
customer_reviews.text: I love this handy organizer. I work out of my car and I had a constant mess of papers and pens on my passenger front seat. Everything is easily accessible and organized now and I can move through my work quicker because of it. I wouldn’t have thought I’d appreciate something so simplistic and boring as a front seat organizer, but I’m really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LPerk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my dad and he LOVES it! Easy to carry around and holds a lot of stuff. I bought from Lusso Gear and they are a top notch seller. I had a problem with the one I bought and they responded within an hour of my email to them and they had a replacement in my dad’s hands less than 48 hours later. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver GameChanger
customer_reviews.text: I do home health physical therapy and this thing is a life saver. Let’s me keep exercise programs and other documentation conveniently beside me. I keep my gum, sunglasses, chapstick, sticky notes, and Bluetooth keyboard in there also with the papers I need daily. Highly recommend for anyone working out of their car.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CABBY'S AND PEOPLE WHO NEED TO FIND THEIR ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: NO DISLIKES. I hung this from the front passenger seat of my cab, using the headrest to hang it on, and was able to easily reach over and grab receipts, papers, pens, computer when needed, and the cellphone holder is great if you have AirPods. I would recommend this to any cab driver, but also to people who need to access their notes, papers, and pens on the go. It was also easy to shoulder carry. I wish it came with a velcro patch on the back, but those are easily applicable yourself if you need one. Karl G
customer_reviews.author: K guiilen

customer_reviews.title: Great for long commutes, easy to flip around when you have a passenger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get rid of the side seat clutter for my 5 hour weekly drive/ commute Easy to access while on road - a place for everything... and you can take with you in the not so secure areas or flip around if you have that unexpected passenger without having to clean off the seat to make room
customer_reviews.author: eferg91

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs a way to close the flap. Does not flop open.
customer_reviews.text: This would almost be perfect if there was a way to buckle or stick the flap closed. If you tilt your front seat backs, this kind of hangs out making less leg room in the back. I'm keeping because I like the flap and the fact it does not flop open when you have a lot of items int he top pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tereerose

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This organizer solves a lot of problems of what to do with stuff in my car. I'm usually in the car by myself so I have it facing front in the passenger seat, but it's simple to swing it around if I have a passenger. Wish I'd found this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: zenpond

customer_reviews.title: Car front seat organizer
customer_reviews.text: Hi. Thanks for following up on users product experience. When I received your product, I immediately used it in my car. I enjoy using the organizer a lot. It has pockets for my calendar, my trip log book, my other important work papers, pen holders, phone pocket, a cover, and a strap to attach on the car headrest! It's affordable and is an excellent design for a busy person like me. I used to put my trip log book beside my seat, on the passenger seat, or in a makeshift cardboard box which is very unsightly and taking space. Thank you for creating an awesome organizer like this one. More power to your business !
customer_reviews.author: Tori Silverio

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for some storage space on the schoolbus I drive. There are no headrests and the strap wasn't long enough to go around the seat. The company emailed me checking on how I like it. I told them about the strap being short and asked the dimensions so I could get an extender. They took the liberty of sending me one no charge even though I offered to pay. Loving the extra storage and amazed at their helpfulness! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Churchward

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I love all the different size products and that it can be used as a purse as well to carry and organize all my sons items. I use it in the back seat to organize all items we bring into places to keep him busy and it is so handy.
customer_reviews.author: A.Newman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product for my CEO and she LOVES it! She is always out and about, traveling to accounts, etc and this has helped her stay organized in the front of her car. Previously she had folders and papers sliding all over the place but your organizer has been a game changer. Now everything is right where she needs it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Yentes

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to keep car items organized
customer_reviews.text: It takes up quite a bit of space from my already limited back seat space and the cover doesnt exactly cover it completely when you have stuff it in, but it's very handy. I like that I can flip it from either the rear or front of seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect setup for car..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car. My office is my car so it’s nice to have something no overly big to help get everything organized. Holds papers, pens, staple, mouse and a lot more with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I wanted to stop carrying a purse, but still have essential items in my car. This bag keeps everything neatly organized and easy to access, love it.
customer_reviews.author: B.P. Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love having an organized car. This works perfect and when I have someone in the passenger seat I just swing it around to the back. I liked it so much I bought one for my dad. Great gift for people who love to be organized!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: Great for a mobile office.
customer_reviews.text: Great for in and out access car for out of office appointments. Compartmentalized. If you you don’t want to carry a briefcase like me then this is great for you. Just don’t overload it. I noticed a small rip near the seam under the flap. My fault trying to carry to much.
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: It does what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my papers in my big truck. It is everything I want it to be. I highly recommend it for organizing paperwork, If your looking for something to organize kids stuff in your car, it’s probably my big enough, but it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hospice nurse that visits patients in their home, so my car is my office. This front seat organizer is great to hold my files, iPad, pens, phone, etc. It even has a cover that I can keep over the whole organizer when I’m not using it. When I get home all I have to do is take it off the headrest and put it on my shoulder to carry it in. I’m no longer fighting my stuff falling in the floor or trying to gather it all up to get it from the car to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Loriwv

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and flimsy feeling, easy to install, just received this so I will see how it holds up when I return to work and exposure to heat and sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: SamMy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: My son has mobility issues and uses a power chair in school and this fits over the headrest and keeps his chrome book, binders, and school supplies organized and easy to get to. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Samh

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all of my life?
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the sales/marketing arena for almost 8 years now and I always have piles of 'stuff' throughout my car. Something made be look for a seat organizer and I found this and it has been an absolute game changer. It is sturdy and my front seat is so tidy and it easily flips around if I have a passenger. I would highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Husband works out of his vehicle. He loves it. Keeps everything organized. Awesome quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great over headrest in passenger side — easy access for driver. Holds quite a bit and is sturdy enough to maintain shape. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chark

customer_reviews.title: Impressed. Serves the purpose well.
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck. I wanted something to put file folders and a few charger cables. The side pocket was big enough for my hard glasses case. I'd buy again. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’m a weirdo when it comes to neatness and organizing. I love that you can easily move it to the back seat and you can easily carry it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerfan01

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I take long road trips with my kids often and this makes it so much easier to keep their car ride activities organized. It’s very roomy and is perfect for coloring books and other crafts stuff that they bring. The product says front seat organizer but I use it as a back seat organizer and works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Magen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it neat
customer_reviews.text: My front seat is no longer a mess. Love this bag. Room for pens, glasses, papers, cell phone and such. One of my best investments.
customer_reviews.author: Bonni Bailey

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is not too small and not too big. The quality seems to be good so far. The pockets allow for easy organization of your things.
customer_reviews.author: LEE TUCSON

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Had this in my truck for a while now and I like it a lot. Good quality and the pockets and compartments are all the right sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T.

customer_reviews.title: My New Police Vehicle Seat Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a seat organizer for my Police Subsidized Vehicle to keep my seat organized and this purchase is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan & Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Not good for everyday use, plastic buckle for strap broke in 2 weeks. Bought it to hold some police equipment from flying off seat. Nice looking bag tho
customer_reviews.author: Joe O'M

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids have books, Kleenex, hand-santi, coloring pencils, earbuds, and so much more. This keeps my car organized and free of clutter.
customer_reviews.author: David Kunsman

customer_reviews.title: Great “On-the-Go” Organizer for Work Orders
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my son, an electrician, as a gift & he uses it daily to keep info on each of his jobs. It keeps all of the info handy & organized within reach! According to him, it was exactly what he needed to keep his paperwork neat & easily available.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I can keep my stuff that I need in a sturdy organizer, plus the flap that comes down makes it look nice and neat. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: [b]

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Really helped organize my work van. A lot less clutter. Canvas like material with a lot of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Betta

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well as an organizer. Better than a box which I carried all my papers and binders in before.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful if you spend a lot of time in the car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with a ton of functionality for someone who spends a lot of time in their vehicle. My only wish is that it wasn't designed to be used in such a public space in the vehicle (hanging from the head rest of the passenger seat) for security purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Damm

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer for front seat. It is exactly as described and shown in the photos. Lusso has great car products.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mom NJ

customer_reviews.title: If space is limited, this items creates more
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this item. I drive Tractor Trailer and there is limited space. This item fully meets my expectations and allows me to store my important papers in an easy to reach and accessible storage area. I highly recommend it to anyone whose business requires storage that fully allows mobility and security.....kudos to the creator
customer_reviews.author: Gregory p Moore sr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for a contractor, keeps all my notebooks and forms off the floor from having to hit the brakes, bought one for each truck, love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best seat organizer I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Really improved my work truck that doesn't have a console that opens. Easy to install and has good storage capability. On the rare occasion I have a apssanger I can put it on the back of the seat with ease. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Rayburn III

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect organizer
customer_reviews.text: This front seat organizer is great for every day use and amazing for road trips. It’s very durable and sturdy, practical and has a lot of pockets for every item conceivable and more!
customer_reviews.author: Mashkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my construction projects at the moment. Has really helped me stay organized and keep paperwork and other items such as back up batteries, e-tape measures, and writing utensils. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This seat organizer is the perfect size to fit the Rand McNally Map and other essentials needed for our long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Fmac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fix for a busy car!
customer_reviews.text: I work from my car and this has helped me be more organized and even clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids books
customer_reviews.text: I use it on the back of the seat to hold my son's books and toys and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for our rv. They work exceptionally well... one for my husband and one for myself. Very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Mamafrijoles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! I work out of my car and the constant disorganization was stressing me out! This SOLVED my problem and I use it frequently as a shoulder bag because everything is so conveniently accessible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I received it very quickly. The company is family owned and emailed me to see if I had received it. It is perfect for what I need and well made, I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I can fit a lot in this bad and it’s easy to carry in and out of my car.
customer_reviews.author: C Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my squad car. I was thinking it’s cheap so don’t expect much, but that’s not the case with this one. I love this caddy and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: April West

customer_reviews.title: Ultra-Durable Car Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. It met my expectations. The order arrived on time and was exactly what I ordered. It is not too big or too bulky. It holds multiple files which is the reason that I needed it. I will definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++ in my book
customer_reviews.text: This is so helpful. I’m a home care nurse and this is such a great way to keep organized!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the product over all. It's great quality, clean lines and very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is well-made and holds everything I need in my car. I use it for work, since I travel often for my job. The organizer has pockets of different sizes that hold items I use while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Secure
customer_reviews.text: I like it most because I can easily put my 40oz water bottle, which won't fit in the cupholder, in the large area without issue. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Interior design for my car !
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep odds and ends in a place.... I keep extra gloves, sunglasses, and grocery bags all tucked away in this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my semi, now all my paperwork organized.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr

customer_reviews.title: Get organized!
customer_reviews.text: My pickup is my office. I needed a organizer pretty desperately. This is well constructed, can easily be swung around the headrest to the back of the seat, and with its top flap, looks a little better than most organizers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for those who travel for work!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I travel a lot and needed something for the car. But at the end of the day when I need to go into the hotel to work... I can throw it over my shoulder and have an organized work space in the hotel. Must have done this who travel for work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depending on your vehicle adults may not have much leg room. Other than that great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage space and the organization of the product. Not a lot of leg room for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So great for holding everything and being able to move it when someone rides in your car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to use in his patrol car. He thinks it is awesome and keeps his stuff organized and easy to reach.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Books secured
customer_reviews.text: In the picture looks bigger but I can safely store my specifications book that always was falling when I stop suddenly
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great Front Car Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer arrived a day early than was previously stated. It is perfect for what I need to organize a variety to items in the front seat of my car. I like that it swings from the front to back early and has a flap that covers the items if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Frances McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fits perfectly. Very convenient for times of uncertainty when working out of your work truck due to the Corona Virus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organization in work truck
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his work vehicle to keep his work orders, notebooks, and misc items contained. He drives as a first responder for electrical issues and so his truck is his office.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality canvas bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag, easy to install. Fits lots of items, all shapes and varieties.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I'm in law enforcement and love this bag so far. The back is sturdy which keeps it from sagging when hung up on the headrest. Since it isn't very long, I have space on my seat underneath it. Space is a luxury in a patrol car.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Practical
customer_reviews.text: What a great product for work in the car! It holds papers, files, pens, drinks everything and can be transported in and out easily. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerWV

customer_reviews.title: Good car bag
customer_reviews.text: It's in my car and I stash all those extras I need in it..several compartments ..sturdy. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Private Investigator so I work out of y car. I used to put all of my supplies (Laptop, mouse, documents, pens, etc....) on the passenger seat, but now everything is organized with easy access to everything I need. Thanks, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for, my car is my office and this keeps everything organized. No more digging through a pile on the front seat. No more picking everything up off the floorboard after a sudden stop! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janette Scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great seat organizer!! I would recommend it. Easy to install and adjust, the company is very friendly and will help guide you through the installation if you are having trouble. Has plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Extremely well made. Unmatched craftsmanship. The company takes pride in their work and it shows. This is the third product I have purchased from them and they never disappoint. Perfect for any traveling professional who often uses their car as an "office".
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational bag
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my brochures and business tools organized and from falling off the front seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for awhile now, and while the tops of the dividers have collapsed some, it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yost

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his car for work. It is roomy and sturdy and does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to strap around head rest and had plenty of room for misc items. Numerous compartments make it easy to divide items.
customer_reviews.author: Gsxrgirl

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on all fronts
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Paper towels, sanitizer, water bottle, various tools for quick work, a few maps, flashlight and backup Garmin Nuvi.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Median size and holds all my stuff for my patrol vehicle. Well recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for keeping all of my gear with me in the front of my vehicle. Perfect for those of us that work out of a car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon211

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for car storage
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to hold items in the car. Love that it has a flap to cover the contents and is easy to swing to the back of the seat when passenger seat is needed.
customer_reviews.author: MaryP

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband to organize in his work truck. Fits perfectly over the middle seat and holds just about everything he has. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ephares

customer_reviews.title: Its exactly what I've needed for some time.
customer_reviews.text: Its compact, but with plenty of space. I use it for my work truck and I use it to keep my paperwork and books in one place and not all over the floor of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Salomon

product_meta.title: Lusso Gear Car Organizer for Front Seat or Car Seat | Ultra-Durable, One-Size-Fits All Car Storage Organizers | Easily Keep Supplies Secure & Upright with Premium Car Seat Organizer for Kids & Adults
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR CAR OFFICE ORGANIZED: Declutter your front seat and conveniently organize and store your essential office and travel supplies neatly in your vehicle so they’re ready whenever and wherever you need them! Organize everything you need to get the job done, including your laptop, iPad, tablet, mobile phone, file folders, papers, pens, and chargers/gadgets! Plus, store accessories like keys, tissue, water bottles, sunglasses, hand sanitizer, umbrellas, books/magazines, and snacks.

EASY TO USE WITH ANY VEHICLE: Installing our Lusso Gear Car Front Seat Organizer is easy! Simply attach the strap to the passenger headrest and adjust it to your preferred height. It works with every type of vehicle, including cars, trucks, minivans, SUVs, RVs, campers, boats, semis, buses, cabs/taxis, and more! Plus, it’s easy to detach and bring it in and out of your vehicle whenever you need to.

DESIGNED FOR DEMANDING USE: Our front seat car organizer is used by all types of demanding users, both personal and professional, including lawyers, real estate agents, sales reps, truck drivers, law enforcement professionals, police officers, security officers, taxi/cab drivers, travelling nurses, business commuters, road warriors, soccer moms, and others who either work from a car office or have a need for a high quality mobile office organizer.

STYLISH LOOKS & STURDY DESIGN: Hit the road in style! Our Lusso Gear Car Front Seat Organizer featuring a variety of compartments and pockets for easy access to everything you need to organize! Plus, the built in security flap acts as a theft deterrent by concealing the contents of your organizer to keep them out of the sight of would be thieves, and it conveniently tucks away when not in use. Reinforced back support with strong buckles prevent sagging and ensure items don't fall while driving!
GUARANTEED FOR LIFE: We stand behind our Lusso Gear Car Front Seat Organizer with an unconditional lifetime guarantee! We’ll replace or refund your order if you’re not completely satisfied!
